thread.title: VIA Rail train service resumed between Toronto and Montreal, Toronto and Ottawa
thread.title_full: VIA Rail train service resumed between Toronto and Montreal, Toronto and Ottawa

author: eTN Global Editor
title: VIA Rail train service resumed between Toronto and Montreal, Toronto and Ottawa
text:
VIA Rail train service resumed between Toronto and Montreal, Toronto and Ottawa Adv: 
Jul 19, 2015 Adv: 
MONTRÃ‰AL, Canada - VIA Rail Canada (VIA Rail) wishes to inform its passengers that its train service has resumed between Toronto and Ottawa, as well as between Toronto and Montreal, in both directions. Following yesterday's derailment of a CN freight train, VIA Rail's service on these routes was interrupted and alternate transportation was offered to its passengers onboard en-route trains. 
Delays are expected throughout the day due to imposed speed restrictions on the site and possible railway congestion. 
For more information, please contact our telephone sales office at 1 888 VIA-RAIL (888 842-7245), TTY 800-268-9503 (hearing impaired). Please accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience this situation may cause you.
